Field Detail

immutable

public boolean immutable
true, determines that this renderer can not be replaced by other UI Renderer in a UI Theme. Immutable renderer only can be replaced by other immutable UI Renderer too.

Constructor Detail

UIRenderer

public UIRenderer()
Method Detail

UIName

public abstract java.lang.String UIName()
This renderer will only render components with name equal with this renderer name.

See Also:
TComponent.UIName()

UIDescription

public abstract java.lang.String[] UIDescription()
Description of UI created by this renderer. Component that used external UI must follow this UI description for proper rendering.

See Also:
TComponent.setExternalUI(BufferedImage[], boolean)

remove

protected final java.lang.Object remove(java.lang.String key)
Removes installed UI Resource from this UI Renderer. Use this when override UI Renderer and the resource is not valid anymore.

Returns UI Resource mapping of this renderer.
